Module klotski_ids
Package klotski_ids.controllers.frameMenu

Class LevelMenuController

java.lang.Object
klotski_ids.controllers.frameMenu.LevelMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LevelMenuController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the level menu in the user interface. Implements the Initializable interface.

  • Method Details

    • setStageWindow

      private void setStageWindow(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Sets the stage window to display the loaded game scene.
      Parameters:
      button - the button that triggered the action event

    • loadGameScene

      private void loadGameScene() throws IOException
      Loads the game scene and initializes the game controller.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during loading the scene

    • goToLevel

      private void goToLevel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Action event handler for navigating to a specific level. Loads the game scene, reads the level data from the corresponding JSON file, and initializes the game controller.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event triggered by the button click
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during loading the scene

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the level menu. Shows the initial level based on the currentLevel variable.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - the URL location of the FXML file
      resourceBundle - the resource bundle used by the FXML file

    • showPreviousLevel

      public void showPreviousLevel()
      Displays the previous level in the level menu. Decrements the currentLevel variable and updates the visibility of level anchor panes and navigation buttons.

    • showNextLevel

      public void showNextLevel()
      Displays the next level in the level menu. Increments the currentLevel variable and updates the visibility of level anchor panes and navigation buttons.

    • showLevel

      private void showLevel(int level)
      Shows the specified level in the level menu. Sets the visibility of level anchor panes and enables/disables navigation buttons accordingly.
      Parameters:
      level - the level to be shown
